detail_desc: Top in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.
Wallet in leather with six card compartments, one note compartment and one outer compartment. Lined. Size 1.5x8x10 cm.
Longer, wide-fitting jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a square neckline front and back, smocked bodice and long puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the shoulders and cuffs.
Leg warmers in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads.

Coat in an Italian wool blend with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, welt side pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Top in piqué made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and short dolman sleeves with sewn-on fabric panels. Yoke at the back and ribbed trims around the neckline and sleeves. Boxy fit at the top with a tapered waist and rounded hem at the front. Shorter at the back.
Elastic bracelets with beads made from semi-precious stones, glass and plastic.
Bracelets in various designs, one with an elastic strap and four in an adjustable length.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Small shoulder bag made from recycled plastic beads with a metal chain shoulder strap. No fastener. Size 1x10x10.5 cm.
Fully-lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the side and super-flared legs with asymmetric hems.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Short dress in airy chiffon containing glittery threads with an opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a smocked seam at the waist. Underdress in jersey with a sheen.
Shorts in a linen and cotton blend with a zip fly and extended waistband with a hook-and-eye fastening at the waist. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a rubber appliqué on one sleeve. Padded, fleece-lined hood and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Fleece-lined side pockets with a concealed press-stud and a fleece-lined inner pocket. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Push-up bralette in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and racer back. No fasteners.
Sandals in imitation leather with a relief print and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and transparent soles with motion-activated flashing lights.

Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra. Vest top with deep armholes and an opening at the back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, a racer back and an elasticated hem.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Vest top in soft jersey with a yoke at the front.
Sleeveless dress in slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam and a flared skirt.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey with a lightly brushed finish. Straight-cut top with long, wide raglan sleeves. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.

Baby Exclusive. Down all-in-one suit with a soft fleece lining and pile-lined hood. Diagonal zip at the front that continues down one leg and narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hems. Foldover edge at the cuffs and hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.

Sleeveless maxi dress in a viscose weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and an open section with lacing at the back. Concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with frills, a wrapover front with ties, side support and adjustable shoulder straps.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a one-button fastening at the front and welt front pockets with a flap.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Brushed metal stud earrings with decorative sparkly stones and glass and plastic beads. Size 2 cm.

Trainers in imitation suede with details in imitation leather and mesh. Padded top edge, a tongue and lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles. The polyester content of the trainers is partly recycled.
Multi-strand necklace of thin metal chains. Adjustable length 46-53 cm.
Sandals with narrow straps, covered block heels and elasticated ankle straps. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Turban in a soft rib knit.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck and long sleeves. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, elasticated drawstring waist and fake diagonal front pockets.
Wide waist belt in quilted imitation leather with a large round metal buckle. Width 5 cm.

Set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Sleeveless dress with a gathered seam at the hips and flared skirt. Top with flutter sleeves and a slightly longer, rounded back. Shorts in sturdy jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist. 3/4-length leggings with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.

Short, fitted dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam at the waist with a sewn-in tie belt at the side.
Cropped T-shirt in jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Short, A-line dress in airy chiffon with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Frill-trimmed seam at the top and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, visible button fly and skinny legs.
Trainers in canvas with lacing at the front and contrasting colour seams. Mesh linings, insoles in a cotton weave, and patterned soles.
Cardigan knitted in soft wool with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, padded jacket in cotton canvas with a pile-lined collar and zip down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and an inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs, and a tab and button at the sides. Quilted lining.
Top in viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves and a straight hem with short slits in the sides.

Oversized polo-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Blouse in satin with a V-neck, collar, buttons down the front and long, cuffed sleeves.

Lightly padded parka in rustle-weave fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, unlined hood, and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets and large patch pockets with a flap at the front. Elasticated cuffs with a tab and button, and a drawstring hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Lightweight trenchcoat in twill made from a cupro and viscose blend with notch lapels, a loose yoke at the back and long raglan sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets with a decorative flap, and a single back vent. Unlined.

Straight-cut jacket in cotton twill with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist and flap chest and front pockets with a concealed press-stud. Concealed press-stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with elastication at the top, short sleeves with ties, and a rounded hem.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Leggings in jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist.
Maxi dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Smocked seam at the waist and a skirt that is longer at the back. Unlined.
Wide shirt jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Notch lapels, a concealed fastening at the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Printed cotton jersey T-shirt.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and lacing down the legs.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft, washed denim with embroidery. Elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Baby Exclusive. Captain's cap in a cotton weave with covered buttons at the sides and twisted braiding at the front. Lined.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey-lined trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and seams at the knees.

Jeans in washed stretch denim with matching braces. Concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, press-stud fly, front and back pockets and patches on the legs. Elasticated braces with immitation leather appliqués.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a ribbed neckline and tie detail at the front of the hem.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom and a ribbed, turned-up hem. Cotton jersey lining.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, an open chest pocket and buttons on one shoulder at the back. Trousers with an elasticated waist, back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
